AVIVAPATIENT,SIX  666-00-0926    DOB-FEB 02, 1957 F   
Exm Date: NOV 18, 2011@08:32
Req Phys: PROVIDER,ONEHUNDREDTWENTYNIN   Pat Loc: 7 WEST MEDICINE/02-14-2014@18:
                                         Img Loc: RADIOLOGY MAIN FLOOR
                                         Service: Unknown
Pregnancy Screen: Patient answered no

 

(Case 52 COMPLETE)   CHEST 2 VIEWS PA&LAT             (RAD  Detailed) CPT:71020
     Reason for Study: Cough, Dyspnea, fever

    Clinical History:
      Presents to ER today with c/o cough, dypnea, fever x 3 days.  

    Report Status: Verified                   Date Reported: NOV 18, 2011
                                              Date Verified: MAY 30, 2012
    Verifier E-Sig:

    Report:
      No prior study for comparison. Lung volumes are normal
      bilaterally. Heart size is normal. There are dense consolidations
      in both the right and the left lower lobes.  No pnuemothorax.  No
      definite effusion. 

    Impression:
      likely bilateral lower lobe pneumonia.  

    Primary Diagnostic Code: ABNORMALITY, ATTN. NEEDED

Primary Interpreting Staff:
  THIRTYTWO AVIVAUSER, Staff Physician
          Verified by transcriptionist for THIRTYTWO AVIVAUSER
/AJC
text.author: AVIVAUSER,THIRTYTWO
